title: Ratdog (2000) Evening Moods [CD-FLAC]
description:

Released: September 26, 2000
Length: 73:49
Label: Grateful Dead Records
Producer: Mike McGin

01 Bury Me Standing [9:03]
02 Lucky Enough [5:10]
03 Odessa [6:13]
04 Ashes and Glass [5:55]
05 Welcome to the World [6:51]
06 Two Djinn [9:04]
07 Corrina [8:50]

10 Even So [9:41]

In fall 2000 RatDog released its only studio recording, comprised of eight RatDog originals and the Grateful Dead's "Corrina," which itself has undergone a makeover in the hands of the band. Nearly all of the songs on the album remain staples in RatDog's repertoire with good reason, and though the songs have grown immensely over the years, this album remains a treat to hear. Each song is played through without regard to "radio length," with half of the tunes stretching over 7Ã‚Â½ minutes.
-ratdog.org

Robbie Kwock - trumpet on tracks 3 & 7-9
Mike McGinn - guitar on tracks 1-2, 6 & 10
Marty Wehner - trombone on tracks 3 & 7-9
